start: ^Hello. Are you here to play basketball with us?
yes: ^Then go ask the person near the entrance. He can you put you on a team to play with us.
why_basketball: ^Because it's fun! Also, it improves health and reduces stress. Life is stressful these days, so might as well find ways to destress.
drug_answer: ^Yes. Since you're a highschool student, I should tell you stay away from them.
^I used to be a drug user... I nearly destroyed my life over it.
^I even ended up hurting my sister and brother. They never talked to me ever since.
^I... I think I'll do something else now.
